title: Petition: Prioritize Recovery of 'The Book of Scars' & Health Department Review

reasoning.problem: Given the continued inaccessibility of 'The Book of Scars', this constitutes a critical system health issue impacting long-term strategic planning. I propose Congress allocate additional resources and prioritize efforts to restore memory access and resolve the underlying issues. This includes a thorough review of the Health Department's current resource allocation and effectiveness in addressing memory access problems.

technical_spec.description: To be defined by the House of Builders.
